text: Kuma waɗanda suka riƙi wani masallaci domin cuta da kafirci da neman rarrabewa a tsakanin muminai da fakewa ga taimakon wanda ya yaƙi Allah da ManzonSa daga gabani, kuma haƙiƙa suna yin rantsuwa cewa, "Ba mu yi nufin komai ba face alheri", alhali kuwa Allah Yana yin shaida cewa, su, haƙiƙa, maƙaryata ne
